SELECT TSRL.refund_list_no AS refund_list_no , TSRL.order_cd , OD.order_cd , CUSTOMER.cus_nm AS cus_nm , PROD_INFO.l_ct_nm AS l_ct_nm , PROD_INFO.prod_nm AS prod_nm , OD.refund_cnt AS return_cnt , TSRL.scm_nm AS scm_nm , TSRL.approve_nm AS approve_nm , DATE_FORMAT(TSRL.submit_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS submit_date , WH.warehouse_nm AS warehouse_nm , OD.refund_amt , PROD_INFO.supply_nm FROM tb_order AS OD
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT loginID , name AS cus_nm , user_type FROM tb_userinfo ) AS CUSTOMER ON OD.loginID = CUSTOMER.loginID
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT refund.refund_list_no , refund.order_cd , refund.submit_date , scm.name AS scm_nm , approve.name AS approve_nm , scm.user_type FROM tb_scm_refund_list AS refund LEFT JOIN tb_userinfo AS scm ON refund.scm_id = scm.loginID LEFT JOIN tb_userinfo AS approve ON refund.approve_id = approve.loginID ) AS TSRL ON OD.order_cd = TSRL.order_cd
LEFT JOIN tb_scm_warehouse AS WH ON OD.warehouse_cd = WH.warehouse_cd
LEFT JOIN( SELECT TSP.product_cd , TSP.prod_nm , TSLC.l_ct_nm , TSS.supply_nm FROM tb_scm_product AS TSP LEFT JOIN tb_scm_m_category AS TSMC ON TSP.m_ct_cd = TSMC.m_ct_cd LEFT JOIN tb_scm_l_category AS TSLC ON TSMC.l_ct_cd = TSLC.l_ct_cd LEFT JOIN tb_scm_supply AS TSS ON TSP.supply_cd = TSS.supply_cd ) AS PROD_INFO ON OD.product_cd = PROD_INFO.product_cd
WHERE 1 = 1
AND PROD_INFO.prod_nm IS NOT NULL
AND PROD_INFO.prod_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchInfo}, '%')
AND CUSTOMER.user_type = "J"
AND CUSTOMER.cus_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchInfo}, '%')
AND TSRL.user_type = "J"
AND TSRL.scm_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchInfo}, '%')
AND TSRL.scm_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchInfo}, '%') OR CUSTOMER.cus_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchInfo}, '%') OR PROD_INFO.prod_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchInfo}, '%')
AND TSRL.refund_list_no IS NOT NULL
AND TSRL.submit_date BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s')
ORDER BY TSRL.refund_list_no DESC LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize}

SELECT SCM.name AS scm_nm , L_CATEGORY.l_ct_nm AS l_ct_nm , PRODUCT.prod_nm AS prod_nm , OD.refund_cnt AS refund_cnt , WH.warehouse_nm AS warehouse_nm , SUPPLY.supply_nm AS supply_nm , DATE_FORMAT(OD.refund_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS refund_date , OD.refund_amt AS refund_amt , DATE_FORMAT(OD.order_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS order_date , DATE_FORMAT(TSRL.submit_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS submit_date , APPROVE.name AS approve_nm FROM tb_order AS OD
LEFT JOIN tb_scm_refund_list AS TSRL ON TSRL.order_cd = OD.order_cd
LEFT JOIN tb_userinfo AS SCM ON TSRL.scm_id = SCM.loginID
LEFT JOIN tb_userinfo AS APPROVE ON TSRL.scm_id = APPROVE.loginID
LEFT JOIN tb_scm_warehouse AS WH ON OD.warehouse_cd = WH.warehouse_cd
LEFT JOIN tb_scm_supply AS SUPPLY ON OD.warehouse_cd = SUPPLY.warehouse_cd
LEFT JOIN tb_scm_product AS PRODUCT ON OD.product_cd = PRODUCT.product_cd
LEFT JOIN tb_scm_m_category AS M_CATEGORY ON PRODUCT.m_ct_cd = M_CATEGORY.m_ct_cd
LEFT JOIN tb_scm_l_category AS L_CATEGORY ON M_CATEGORY.l_ct_cd = L_CATEGORY.l_ct_cd
WHERE refund_list_no = #{refund_list_no}
